vsParam:
So, students of alchemy,
please start your synthesis with given materials!

The time is short,
but you must be careful!

Bergamot Sensei!
We just need to help you collect materials, right?

Yes, thank you.
I also need to trouble students of other disciplines.

It's alright. We should help each other in tough times.
Right, guys?

Yeah! Students of relicology are all here,
I'll go summon students of other disciplines!

But, this commission is such a large-scale one.
It's not common to see such a big commission...

Uh... But, our teams are very coordinated.
We should be able to complete the commission smoothly.

What... is going on?
Is this group training thing common?

No. We are now facing with a big trouble,
so everyone is gathered to come up with a solution.

I can see that.
But it's incredible! Everyone in the Academy becomes a whole...

Hee hee, we should help each other in tough times!
This is "comrade" in the Academy!
... It's not like I don't know about it.
Mimi, how about you come and help too?
What!? Why do you bring it up...

Why... never mind.
Got it. I'll help.

This is just for playing house, playing house as"comrades"!
I am just playing with you!

Yeah! Hee hee, thank you!
Even so, I am still very happy!

If I am helping,
you guys must make proper things.

I'll help you check the quality of medicines,
show me when you are done!

But, can we make it with this speed?
We still need to make a lot of medicines.
We'll be able to finish on time if we work together.

Tee hee... Ah ha ha, what are you talking about?
That's absurd!
That's right. You have faith in everyone.

You are very coordinated, I can see that.
And I must admit that you guys are very hardworking.

Uh... I said that "comrades" in the Academy...
is just a bunch of "strangers", my apologies.

Uh? I am sorry, Mimi.
What did you say?
I, I didn't say anything! Idiot!

Any, anyway!
I'll go collect materials too!
Don't be loaf on! Do you understand?

Ah, wait, Mimi!
I apologize for my behavior just now!
